reviews.review:
Концовка оставляет в недоумении.
Рекомендую потому что я угробил ещё не один час за бета версиями портал и портал 2

Theres a reason that this game has been sitting among the highest rated games on this platform since its release. Combining both brain-twisting puzzles and a coherent, enjoyable storyline, I've found myself returning to Portal 2 to replay the story repeatedly. If you've never played, I suggest buying it, as its worth every penny. Not only is the story amazing, but the co-op mode is another story in itself, only deepening the content available. Not enough? The amazing community is regularly pumping content out, and with the Portal: Reloaded mod releasing in a mere month, theres no reason not to pick up the game.

10/10.

hikayesiyle de bulmacalarıyla da zamanının ötesinde dört dörtlük harika bi oyun. 10/10. oyunun hikaye ve coop modunu bitirdikten sonra bile topluluk test odaları ile daha fazla bölüm oynayabilirsiniz. 
#StillAlive
a very interactive puzzle game I recommend it :)

[10/10][￥7(-81%)][A. 20/51(39%)]
剧情和解谜融为一体，（不卡关的话）从头玩到尾都不会腻；地下建筑和关卡设计非常惊人，难以想象这是10年前的游戏。
Daha bitmedi ama ilk oyuna göre daha iyi olduğu kesin. Mekanlar, seslendirme, hikaye hepsi daha iyi. Onu çok beğenmiştim buna da bayılacağım sanırsam.
无论是剧情还是游戏都很棒，头疼这给它通关了
it big good just buy it
no tengo quejas han pasado años y sigue siendo un juegaso

Portal 2 is one of the best puzzle games I've ever played. The levels are very well designed, the characters are memorable, the dialogues are humourous, the puzzles can get confusing at times but not impossible to solve, multiplayer is a lot of fun and the story is great especially GLaDOS and Chell's relationship. I absolutely love this game.
portalı beğenmeyen ne bileyim... Starcraft mı oynuyor?

Absolutely fantastic game for all ages. Great storyline, perfect sequel to an already amazing game, good humor, nice engine (good for regular playstyle and speedrunning), sick visuals and atmosphere, the multiplayer mode is very fun (just like the singleplayer mode but with more stupidity - easy to find new friends to play with), extra game mechanics and "hidden" progressive tutorials, mind twisting puzzles and the "Ah ha" moment, and the puzzle editor feature. This feature developed a lot of passion for Portal in the community, and it also encourages players to make their own work, to open up Hammer and build masterpieces, and to mod the game. This keeps a stable community around Portal even after 9 years.
есть два портала, в какой сам войдёшь, а в какой друга отправишь?

I love it! But there is a bug that some people (including me) have encountered, Apparently, on mac, sometimes you will be unable to move your camera. You can go in the menu and move the mouse, you can walk around, and also place portals, but you can not move the camera.

Other than that, I love this game and would recommend getting it. 10/10

One of my favorite games of all time. The humor alone makes the game great.

Jogava muito no PS3, resolvi comprar para o PC e não me arrependi, rodando lisinho no ultra. É um jogo leve, a maioria dos pcs roda, mas não deixa de ser lindo e EXTREMAMENTE DIVERTIDO. Se você gosta de quebrar a cabeça com os puzzles, esse jogo é perfeito.

i played this game in 2 big chunks, and enjoyed every second of it. i got stumped a lot because i would forget mechanics i had learned because this game just shoves so many in your face and uses them in such creative ways that you will use this one strategy once 2 chambers ago and then it suddenly becomes integral to your survival. also there's a level where you cover the chamber in cum.
me encanto el juego y lo de hacer mapas y jugar mapas es increible

Creative game-play and thrilling story. It's fun puzzles always get me thinking. The Co-op is hilarious as well for being a primarily single player game, and I have most of my playtime in the multiplayer with various friends. 10/10
